note: All figures correspond to [modeled ILO estimates](#dod:ilo-modelled-estimates). Employment is defined in line with the [13th ICLS](#dod:13-icls) and includes the production of goods for own use, such as subsistence farming.
title: Share of employment in agriculture, industry, and services
subtitle: Distribution of total employment between the [agriculture](#dod:employment_agriculture), [industry](#dod:employment_industry), and [services](#dod:employment_services) sectors. Economic sectors are classified by the main activity of the workplace, not by the specific tasks the worker performs.
